title: My favorite Michigan J. Frog scene
excerpt: I've found the more "magical" side of life to be exactly like this cartoon.  You can't show anyone something they don't already believe in.  "To he who know's, no explanation is necessary. To he who knows not, none is possible."

title: Why Build Toys
excerpt: I first wrote this essay a few years ago. A founder mentioned it to me over the weekend, and so I decided to re-publish it here. One thing that's bothered me in the time since I wrote it is the way...
